mapper.sql: select id, win_time, user_id, game_id, game_name, win_money, big_small_money, other_money, combination_money, deduct_money, cash_back_money, commission_money, is_delete, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from userwin
mapper.insert: insert into userwin( user_id, game_id, game_name, win_money, big_small_money, other_money, combination_money, deduct_money, cash_back_money, commission_money, is_delete, create_by, win_time, create_time )values( #{userId}, #{gameId}, #{gameName}, #{winMoney}, #{bigSmallMoney}, #{otherMoney}, #{combinationMoney}, #{deductMoney}, #{cashBackMoney}, #{commissionMoney}, #{isDelete}, #{createBy}, CURDATE(), sysdate() )
mapper.delete:
delete from userwin where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(win_money) AS win_money FROM userwin WHERE is_delete = '0' AND user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(win_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{winTime}
SELECT game_id AS game_id ,SUM(win_money) AS win_money FROM userwin WHERE is_delete = '0' AND user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(win_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{winTime} GROUP BY game_id

SELECT uw.user_id as user_id ,max(u.nick_name) as nick_name ,max(u.real_name) as real_name ,max(u.amount) as user_money ,uw.win_time as win_time ,uw.game_id as game_id ,max(uw.game_name) as game_name ,max(g.game_mark_id) as game_mark_id ,max(g.game_record) as game_record ,SUM(uw.win_money) AS win_money ,SUM(uw.big_small_money) AS big_small_money ,SUM(uw.other_money) AS other_money ,SUM(uw.combination_money) AS combination_money ,SUM(uw.deduct_money) AS deduct_money ,SUM(uw.cash_back_money) AS cash_back_money FROM userwin uw inner join sys_user u on u.user_id = uw.user_id inner join sys_game g on g.game_id = uw.game_id WHERE 1 = 1 and uw.user_id = #{userId}
and date_format(uw.win_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(uw.win_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
GROUP BY uw.user_id,uw.win_time,uw.game_id ORDER BY uw.win_time,uw.game_id

SELECT uw.user_id as user_id ,max(u.nick_name) as nick_name ,max(u.real_name) as real_name ,uw.win_time as win_time ,uw.game_id as game_id ,max(uw.game_name) as game_name ,SUM(uw.big_small_money + uw.other_money) AS total_bet_money ,SUM(uw.win_money) AS win_money ,SUM(ROUND((uw.big_small_money + uw.other_money)*g.game_cashback / 100, 2)) AS pre_cash_back_money ,SUM(uw.cash_back_money) AS cash_back_money ,MAX(g.game_cashback) AS cash_back_rate FROM userwin uw inner join sys_user u on u.user_id = uw.user_id inner join sys_game g on g.game_id = uw.game_id WHERE 1 = 1 and uw.user_id = #{userId}
and date_format(uw.win_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(uw.win_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
and case when uw.cash_back_money > 0 then '1' else '0' end = #{cashBackStatus} GROUP BY uw.user_id,uw.win_time,uw.game_id ORDER BY uw.win_time desc,uw.game_id
where cash_back_money = 0 and date_format(win_time,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SUBDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')

SELECT uw.user_id as user_id ,max(u.nick_name) as nick_name ,max(u.real_name) as real_name ,uw.win_time as win_time ,SUM(uw.cash_back_money) AS cash_back_money FROM userwin uw inner join sys_user u on u.user_id = uw.user_id inner join sys_game g on g.game_id = uw.game_id WHERE cash_back_money > 0 and uw.user_id = #{userId}
and date_format(uw.win_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(uw.win_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
GROUP BY uw.user_id,uw.win_time ORDER BY uw.win_time desc,uw.user_id

SELECT uw.user_id as user_id ,max(u.nick_name) as nick_name ,max(u.real_name) as real_name ,pu.user_id as parent_user_id ,max(pu.nick_name) as parent_nick_name ,max(pu.real_name) as parent_real_name ,uw.win_time as win_time ,uw.game_id as game_id ,max(uw.game_name) as game_name ,SUM(uw.commission_money) AS commission_money ,SUM(ROUND((uw.big_small_money + uw.other_money - uw.deduct_money)*g.game_commission / 100, 2)) AS pre_commission_money ,MAX(g.game_commission) AS commission_rate FROM userwin uw inner join sys_user u on u.user_id = uw.user_id inner join sys_game g on g.game_id = uw.game_id inner join sys_user pu on pu.user_id = u.parent_user_id WHERE 1 = 1 and uw.user_id = #{userId}
and date_format(uw.win_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(uw.win_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
and case when uw.commission_money > 0 then '1' else '0' end = #{commissionStatus} GROUP BY uw.user_id,pu.user_id,uw.win_time,uw.game_id ORDER BY uw.win_time desc,uw.game_id
where commission_money = 0 and date_format(win_time,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SUBDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
